examples: A click more than al dente.

words.defineVi: phủ bằng vụn bánh mì

examples: Some of them have claws and jointed antennae, and they all have these external mouthparts that are also jointed.
I don't know if that's double jointed.

Named for their jointed limbs, arthropods have a segmented body covered in a hard exoskeleton and include insects along with crustaceans, milli- and centi-pedes, horseshoe crabs, spiders, scorpions, and other chelicerates.
Arachnids belong to the broader group of animals called arthropods, which are invertebrates with exoskeletons, a segmented body and jointed appendages.
Finally, they've all got paired and jointed appendages, which is actually where their name comes from: arthropod means "jointed feet."

examples: Many varieties of bean contain a protein called phytohemagglutinin, but uncooked red kidney beans have some of the highest levels.
Uncooked meats and cooked meat dishes stored at room temperature can build up massive bacterial populations in just hours.
So we had just sashimi, pretty much everything he prepared for us was uncooked.

If you took a pan of cookie dough, half frozen, half room temperature and put it in a cold oven, eventually, thanks to entropy, you’d get a bunch of equally uncooked cookies, even though the total amount of energy has remained the same.
And make sure your food is cooked properly so you don’t accidentally eat any uncooked parasite eggs.
